notes.body: Hello Anand Kumar,     Greetings from PharmEasy! Please ignore previouse email.     With regards to your order #659023874165993472-40175, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Anand Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy! Please ignore previouse email.

With regards to your order #659023874165993472-40175, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Rishabh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658539327056953344-55605, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine KERABLAK STRIP OF 10 TABLETS 1 quantity, HEPTRAL 400MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS 1 quantity, VALPROL CR 400MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS 1 quantity and LEVERA 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.     Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rishabh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658539327056953344-55605, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine KERABLAK STRIP OF 10 TABLETS 1 quantity, HEPTRAL 400MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS 1 quantity, VALPROL CR 400MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS 1 quantity and LEVERA 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.

Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Lajwanti,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658023870202163200-47114 as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Lajwanti,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658023870202163200-47114 as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to express my concern regarding the continuous delay in the
delivery of my medicines for the last two days. The delivery location is
43/9, Siddhinath Chatterjee Road, Kolkata – 700034.

Despite the order being marked for out of delivery, the delivery person did
not attempt to reach my location. Moreover, I repeatedly tried to contact
the delivery person through the provided phone number, but I could not
reach the delivery person at all.

This delay is causing serious inconvenience, as the medicines are
essential. I request you to kindly look into this matter on priority and

      Subject: Request for Order Cancellation and Refund of ₹958 Due to Continuous Delivery Delay  
      Description:  Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,   
 I am writing to request the cancellation of my PharmEasy order and a refund of ₹958.9 due to continuous delivery delays over the last three days. 
   
 Despite waiting patiently, my order has not been delivered. The delivery person contacted me only once, but unfortunately it was a missed call. After that, I made several attempts to reach the delivery person using the provided phone number, but the number was unreachable. No further attempt was made to contact or deliver the order. 
   
 Due to this repeated inconvenience and lack of proper communication, I kindly request you to cancel my order and initiate a full refund of ₹958.9 within 24 hours. 
   
 Please confirm the cancellation and refund status within 24 hours. 
   
 Thank you for your attention and support. 
   
 Yours sincerely, 
 Sukriti Biswas

notes.body: Hello Tarannum,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand you want to raise a return request for the order ID #659499826665508864-10880. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.  ​    As per the system, the pickup is already completed for ZYMAR 0.3%W/V BOTTLE OF 5ML EYE DROPS of 1 quantity on 16th December 2025.     Please note that once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 7 - 10 business days.     I have jotted down the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Sonali,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.     Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:  https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores     Kindly note that once the form is filled request you to kindly wait for 5 business days for the call, as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further.     If you do not receive a call or email to take this further, it means that your partner's request has not been considered.     Also, please direct your query to our franchise team. Their email ID is franchisequery@pharmeasy.in, and they can assist you better. Kindly provide them with complete details and a valid contact number so that they can connect with you. Our franchise team will then contact you in case of any suitable prospects.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Sonali,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.
 
Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:
https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores
 
Kindly note that once the form is filled request you to kindly wait for 5 business days for the call, as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further.

If you do not receive a call or email to take this further, it means that your partner's request has not been considered.

Also, please direct your query to our franchise team. Their email ID is franchisequery@pharmeasy.in, and they can assist you better. Kindly provide them with complete details and a valid contact number so that they can connect with you. Our franchise team will then contact you in case of any suitable prospects.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello ​Shivam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #624080604324741120-19443. Please be informed, that the return validity for STALIX DM 10/100/1000MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS was 15 days from the date of delivery.    Your order is delivered to you on 13th September 2025 and the return window is closed. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.   PharmEasy offers a flexible return policy for items ordered with us. Under this policy, each item purchased will have a returnable window which can vary anywhere between 0 to 7 days, post its delivery. The return window is listed in the returns section of the order, once delivered. You may check the below link to know about our return policy,  https://PharmEasy.in/help/returns-43000349468/how-does-PharmEasy-s-return-policy-work--43000220410       For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

notes.body: Hello Azhar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​​   I understand your concern with regard to the 658779368162091008-90306. I will surely assist you with this.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.     As reviewed, you had applied the coupon code 25NUMED. According to the terms, this coupon offers 25% off on orders with a cart MRP above Rs. 1000 (with a maximum benefit of Rs. 450). Additionally, get Rs. 50 PharmEasy Credits on your first medicine order.  ​   In your order, a total discount of 30.16% (including Product-level, PharmEasy Credit and coupon discount) was successfully applied on the MRP.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

मेरे द्वारा 4 डिब्बे आर्डर किये गए थे, जिसमे से एक डिब्बे का आधे से ज्यादा दूध पाउडर कार्टून मे डाला था और डिब्बा खुला हुआ था. एवं एक डिब्बा का ढक्कन टूटा था, टोटल 2 डिब्बे खुले हुए निकले मेने डिलीवरी बॉय के सामने ही कार्टून ओपन किया था, क्यूंकि कार्टून के बाजार मिल्क पाउडर लगा हुआ था इसलिए मेने तुरंत फोटो खींच ली थी. आप डिलीवरी बॉय से कन्फर्म कर सकते है,  Image Urls:

notes.body: Hello Arindam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Arindam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Aarush,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #659300897428623360-72251, I see the requested medicine ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 30 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with   ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 15 TABLETS to fulfil your requirements.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.     ​Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     I would like to inform you that if we raise a return request for ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 15 TABLETS then a refund will go to the PharmEasy wallet.     To set the refund preference in the App, update the App to the most recent version.  Click on the Account Icon below. Click on “Set Refund Preferences”.   Select the mode of refund that you prefer.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Aarush,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #659300897428623360-72251, I see the requested medicine ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 30 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with 
ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 15 TABLETS to fulfil your requirements.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.

​Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

I would like to inform you that if we raise a return request for ULTRA D3 10K STRIP OF 15 TABLETS then a refund will go to the PharmEasy wallet.

To set the refund preference in the App, update the App to the most recent version.
Click on the Account Icon below. Click on “Set Refund Preferences”. 
Select the mode of refund that you prefer.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Neeraj,      Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With reference to your order #658634893892870144-90011, I understand that you wish to cancel the PharmEasy Plus membership.     Please be informed that once an order is placed, we are unable to modify or cancel it. Since the Plus membership was purchased as part of this order, we are unable to cancel the membership for this ongoing order.     I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.     I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.  ​  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Neeraj,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With reference to your order #658634893892870144-90011, I understand that you wish to cancel the PharmEasy Plus membership.

Please be informed that once an order is placed, we are unable to modify or cancel it. Since the Plus membership was purchased as part of this order, we are unable to cancel the membership for this ongoing order.

I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.

Regards,  Manisha

notes.body: Hello Rajkumar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #657921356523704320-59499, I understand your concern in regard to the refund amount.     The refund amount of Rs. 441.26 was initiated on 11th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​571103790350).     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rajkumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regards to your order #657921356523704320-59499, I understand your concern in regard to the refund amount.

The refund amount of Rs. 441.26 was initiated on 11th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​571103790350).

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Varun,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #659252301733195776-55277, as checked your concern was highlighted for the missing item. We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that an issue was raised for the missing TELKONOL TRIO 40MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS. As checked, the issue is verified and a refund of Rs. 177.68 /- has been initiated on 16 December 2025 and the same will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Varun,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order #659252301733195776-55277, as checked your concern was highlighted for the missing item. We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that an issue was raised for the missing TELKONOL TRIO 40MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS. As checked, the issue is verified and a refund of Rs. 177.68 /- has been initiated on 16 December 2025 and the same will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Dinkey Ghanshyani

notes.body: Hello Dasharath,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your query is regarding the name change request for order #653199685794136064-53174. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I will surely assist you with the rectification of the bill. I am highlighting this issue to our escalation team and will request them to review it for you. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours. The progress of your concern will be updated on your registered email ID.  ​   Also, with regard to your order ID 653299106944098304, please note that the medicine added to the order requires a valid prescription for processing. As the prescription was not uploaded at the time of placing the order, the system has automatically prefetched the prescription. Therefore, we are unable to make changes to the invoice. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.      I request your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
